main.screencontrollers

Class SpeakerMessageScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.screencontrollers.ScreenController
      • main.screencontrollers.SpeakerMessageScreenController
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class SpeakerMessageScreenController
extends ScreenController
    SpeakerMessageScreenController is the controller of the SpeakerMessageScreen which in charge of handling all message functions for speakers.
    Since:
    2020-11-13
    Author:
    Ruoming Ren
